collection.name: Giant Tree Sap
collection.openText: "The tree reaped from what it sowed.”

specialTipSize.specialTip: Subjects who consume the $0 instantly recover full HP. Also, the HP of the subject is constantly regenerate for a certain period of time.

A found side effect from subjects who consumed the $0. Subjects who endured this side effect exploded and died within 20 to 30 seconds after consuming the $0, dealing White damage to the entire section.
The experiment confirmed that there is a positive relationship between the amount of $0 consumed, the probability of exploding.
